keywords: ['middle eastern folk music', 'low quality audio', 'percussion', 'shaker', 'stringed instrument', 'moderate tempo', 'male voice']
caption: This Middle eastern folk song features a male singer singing the main melody. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. A stringed instrument plays the backing melody. A shaker plays in an eight note pattern. This song can be played at a village fair.
